title: First Prize - National Space Society Space Settlement Contest 2022
description: Developed a comprehensive 50-page research document on sustainability, space habitation, and resource management. Presented both an oral and poster presentation to industry professionals at the 2022 International Space Development Conference (ISDC) in Arlington, VA.

title: Finalist - EduQuest'23 at Shiv Nadar University
description: Designed and modeled a blueprint of a robot to solve the pollution problem in India. Selected to present the functionality of the robot in front of professionals in the field.

title: Honorable Mention - Vision at Knight Hacks VII
description: Developed a Python app empowering users with limited mobility to draw on a virtual canvas using eye tracking and voice commands.
